benefits.name: Benefit
effects: Your exposure to the Shadowfell's magic grants you the following benefits.

benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Shadow Magic
effects: Choose one level 1 spell from the Illusion or Necromancy school of magic. You always have that spell and the Invisibility spell prepared.

benefits.name: You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot
effects: Once you cast either spell in this way, you can't cast that spell in this way again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.
